Package com.google.appinventor.client.widgets

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionDropDown
    An Action Drop Down Button is a composite of a dropdown button and a textbutton.
    ClonedWidget
    Widget whose appearance and behavior is cloned from an original widget.
    ContextMenu
    Context menu widget implementation.
    DropDownButton
    Class representing a drop-down button with its associated menu.
    DropDownButton.DropDownItem  
    Icon
    Implements a UI style icon with caption as seen on the desktops of many operating systems.
    LabeledTextBox
    A TextBox with a leading label.
    TextButton
    A Button that has a specific style.
    Toolbar
    A Toolbar is a horizontal arrangement of buttons (which can be a mixture of regular and drop-down buttons).
    Toolbar.ToolbarItem
    A Toolbar item has a widgetName that is unique over all items in the toolbar, a caption (displayed to the user) and a command to run when the item is selected.
